body: There's a workaround and the fix is not risk-free, so this will be fixed for 9.0

issue.title: Correctly initialize design-time relational model for externally built models

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.
